name: 陳雅玫
objective:
本課程旨在訓練學生能夠靈活運用旅行中會使用的英文，並了解觀光產業的發展及所需之英文溝通內容和能力。課程中透過主題討論，讓學生對於本國及全球觀光產業及事務有進一步的認識。
This course aims to enable students to use English confidently and effectively as professionals in tourism and hospitality industry. In this course, students will also learn about trends and development in the industry at the local and global level, and strengthen their English communicative competence.
schedule:
Week 1: Holiday
Week 2: (1) Introduction; (2) Unit 2：An Introduction to Travel and Tourism
Week 3: (1) Unit 1: An Introduction to Travel and Tourism; (2) Unit 3: Types of Transport
Week 4 : Holiday
Week 5 : (1) Unit 3 : Types of Transport ; (2) Unit 4 : Accommodation
Week 6 : (1) Unit 4 : Accommodation ; (2) Unit 5 : Hotel Staff
Week 7 : (1) Unit 5: Hotel Staff; (2) Unit 6: Planning and Booking a Holiday
Week 8: Unit 6: Planning and Booking a Holiday
Week 9: (1) Mid-term Exam; (2) English Proficiency Test
Week 10: Supplemental Materials
Week 11: Supplemental Materials
Week 12: Unit 7: International Tourism: UK
Week 13: Unit 8: International Tourism: Europe
Week 14: Unit 9: International Tourism: USA
Week 15: Unit 10: Ecotourism
Week 16: Unit 11: New Tourist Destinations
Week 17 : Role Play
Week 18 : Final Exam
scorePolicy:
1. continuous assessment (including attendance, participation, exercises and 
    quizzes): 35%
2. mid-term and final exams: 35%
3. English Proficiency Test: 20%
4. Role play: 10%
materials: Flash on English for Tourism (2nd edition)
